Title: The Mole
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor), Matt O'Brien (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: There's a mole in the precinct and Holt and Jake need to find out who it is before Deputy Chief Madeline Wuntch gets wind of it. Meanwhile, Terry and Rosa visit a "silent" disco to uncover new leads for their new drug task force.
